alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 22 at 5:56PM CDT until July 22 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 540 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 PARISHES IN SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA ASCENSION ASSUMPTION EAST BATON ROUGE IBERVILLE LIVINGSTON ST. JAMES ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST ST. TAMMANY TANGIPAHOA WEST BATON ROUGE IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHERN MISSISSIPPI HANCOCK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADDIS, AMITE, BATON ROUGE, BAY ST. LOUIS, BAYOU SORREL, BRUSLY, CONVENT, COVINGTON, DENHAM SPRINGS, DIAMONDHEAD, DONALDSONVILLE, GONZALES, GRAMERCY, HAMMOND, LABADIEVILLE, LACOMBE, LAPLACE, LUTCHER, MANDEVILLE, PAINCOURTVILLE, PIERRE PART, PLAQUEMINE, PONCHATOULA, PORT ALLEN, PRAIRIEVILLE, RESERVE, ROBERT, SLIDELL, WALKER, WATSON, WAVELAND, AND WHITE CASTLE.
